attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in Theresa May and call a general election
attributes.additional_details: The government should be forced to put this deal to the people via a general election.
attributes.background: After the genera election, the government unfairly gave the DUP extra funding for Northern Ireland in order to secure their votes; effecrively a bribe. This cash was not met by an increase in funding to the other home nations proportional to the money made available to the DUP.
